title: Light/Thin and Elegant Sans Serif used by Studio NEWWORK
content:
I'm not sure if this is custom, so I thought I would check with Typophile experts...

As always I thank you for your assistance!

author: typenerd

comments.content:
We have had some threads recently about elegant very thin sans serifs. Use Google search if the site search here is belly up. Just add "site:www.typophile.com" (without the quotes, and Google will just search this site.

- Mike Yanega
